actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish the National Resource Center for Grandparents.
short_title: National Grandparent Resource Center Act of 1992

summary.text: National Grandparent Resource Center Act of 1992 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to direct the Commissioner of the Administration on Aging to make grants or enter contracts for the establishment of the National Resource Center for Grandparents.

titles.title: National Grandparent Resource Center Act of 1992
To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish the National Resource Center for Grandparents.
